title: Mars square Pluto
summary: Mars locks horns with Pluto, stirring friction around control and consequence. Pressure exposes where habits need transformation. Courage comes from addressing the root.

meaning.headline: Intensity challenges initiative and drive to confront power dynamics.

frames.text: Pluto themes influence initiative and drive, shifting default patterns.
Expect movement; adaptability matters more than certainty.
There is room to experiment with how you respond.
Signals may arrive quickly; small, conscious steps keep you oriented.
A dramatic event is guaranteed to happen.

frictions: Fear of losing control leading to rigid behavior
opportunities: Facing root causes instead of surface symptoms
Channeling intensity into thorough research or repair
Setting clean boundaries in charged dynamics
Letting go of outdated control habits

do: Name the real issue beneath the surface conflict
Choose one area to clean up or simplify today
Share motives plainly to reduce suspicion
Pause before responding when emotions spike
Redirect intensity into problem-solving, not surveillance
avoid: Treating vulnerability as weakness to exploit
Fixating on blame instead of solutions
Letting secrecy grow when transparency is possible

reusable_lines.text: Honest depth work beats trying to manage everything on the surface.
Intensity can be fuel when you steer it toward regeneration.

forbidden_claims: Predictions of crisis, trauma, or loss
Fated outcomes around power or control
allowed_framing: Agency framing around choice and response
Conditional statements about outcomes depending on engagement
